alert.note: Alert for Benton; Washington (Arkansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 21 at 8:00AM CDT by NWS Tulsa
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of Benton and northern Washington Counties through 900 AM CDT... At 800 AM CDT, Doppler radar indicated strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 3 miles southwest of Noel to 4 miles northwest of Prairie Grove. Movement was east at 35 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts of 45 to 55 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down small tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations in or near the path include... Fayetteville... Springdale... Rogers... Bentonville... Bella Vista... Lowell... Farmington... Pea Ridge... Gentry... Elkins... Tontitown... Gravette... Cave Springs... Decatur... Greenland... Highfill... Garfield... Gateway... Springtown... Northwest Arkansas Regional Air... This includes Interstate 49 between mile markers 58 and 93. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...55 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch remains in effect until 1000 AM CDT for northwestern Arkansas.
